  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultiMapController

    Default MapController

        Parameters:
        player - OfflinePlayer to remove

      • isViewing

        boolean isViewing(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)
        Check if a player is viewing this MapWrapper
        Parameters:
        player - OfflinePlayer to check
        Returns:
        true if the player is viewing

      • getMapId

        short getMapId(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)
        Get this MapWrapper's map ID for a player
        Parameters:
        player - OfflinePlayer to get the ID for
        Returns:
        the ID, or -1 if no ID exists (i.e. the player is not viewing)

      • update

        void update(ArrayImage content)
        Update the image in this MapWrapper
        Parameters:
        content - new ArrayImage content

      • sendContent

        void sendContent(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Send the content of this MapWrapper to a player
        Parameters:
        player - Player receiver of the content

      • sendContent

        void sendContent(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                 boolean withoutQueue)
        Send the content of this MapWrapper to a player
        Parameters:
        player - Player receiver of the content
        withoutQueue - if true, the content will be sent immediately

      • showInInventory

        void showInInventory(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                     int slot,
                     boolean force)
        Show this MapWrapper in a player's inventory
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        slot - slot to show the map in
        force - if false, the map will not be shown if the player is in creative mode
        See Also:
        CreativeInventoryMapUpdateEvent

      • showInInventory

        void showInInventory(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                     int slot)
        Show this MapWrapper in a player's inventory
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        slot - slot to show the map in

      • showInHand

        void showInHand(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                boolean force)
        Show this MapWrapper in a player's hand
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        force - if false, the map will not be shown if the player is not holding a map, or is in createive mode
        See Also:
        showInFrame(Player, ItemFrame, boolean), CreativeInventoryMapUpdateEvent

      • showInHand

        void showInHand(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Show this MapWrapper in a player's hand
        Parameters:
        player - Player

      • showInFrame

        void showInFrame(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                 org.bukkit.entity.ItemFrame frame)
        Show this MapWrapper in an ItemFrame
        Parameters:
        player - Player that will be able to see the map
        frame - ItemFrame to show the map in

      • showInFrame

        void showInFrame(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                 org.bukkit.entity.ItemFrame frame,
                 boolean force)
        Show this MapWrapper in an ItemFrame
        Parameters:
        player - Player that will be able to see the map
        frame - ItemFrame to show the map in
        force - if false, the map will not be shown if there is not Map-Item in the ItemFrame

      • showInFrame

        void showInFrame(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                 int entityId)
        Show this MapWrapper in an ItemFrame
        Parameters:
        player - Player that will be able to see the map
        entityId - Entity-ID of the ItemFrame to show the map in

      • showInFrame

        void showInFrame(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                 int entityId,
                 String debugInfo)
        Show this MapWrapper in an ItemFrame
        Parameters:
        player - Player that will be able to see the map
        entityId - Entity-ID of the ItemFrame to show the map in
        debugInfo - String to show when a player looks at the map, or null

      • clearFrame

        void clearFrame(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                int entityId)
        Clear a frame
        Parameters:
        player - Player that will be able to see the cleared frame
        entityId - Entity-ID of the ItemFrame to clear

      • clearFrame

        void clearFrame(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                org.bukkit.entity.ItemFrame frame)
        Clear a frame
        Parameters:
        player - Player that will be able to see the cleared frame
        frame - ItemFrame to clear
